scripts.dev: concurrently "cd app1; yarn dev " "cd app2; yarn dev" "cd base; yarn dev "
scripts.build: concurrently "cd app1; yarn build " "cd app2; yarn build" "cd base; yarn build "
scripts.start: concurrently "cd app1; yarn start " "cd app2; yarn start" "cd base; yarn start "
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd app1; yarn" "cd app2; yarn" "cd base; yarn"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd app1; yarn lint" "cd app2; yarn lint" "cd base; yarn lint"
scripts.lint-fix: concurrently "cd app1; yarn lint --fix" "cd app2; yarn lint --fix" "cd base; yarn lint --fix"
